synopsis.p: Reads a tabular file and applies actions for each line.

description.p: reads source as a tabular file and for each line evaluates each lineActions.

param-doc.name: lineActions
param-doc.p: Action expressions to evaluate at each row. The expressions are evaluated from the element specified by sourceElement.

The library tab defines the following functions:
tab:column(N) : value of the Nth column.
tab:source : name of the input source being parsed.
tab:line : current row number.
tab:width : number of column in the current row.

param-doc.name: sourceElement
param-doc.p: For each source, this expression is evaluated as a sngle element from the corpus. lineActions will be evaluated from this element.

param-doc.name: source
param-doc.p: Source of CSV. Maybe a path to a file or an URL

param-doc.name: trimColumns
param-doc.p: Either to trim values from leading and trailing whitespace

param-doc.name: checkNumColumns
param-doc.p: Either to check that all rows have the same number of columns. The execution will fail if one row has a wrong number of columns.

param-doc.name: trueCSV
param-doc.p: Use CSV Commons library (handles quoted values).
